title: Big win!
message: You won the lottery! You gain §400.

title: The farm is not a safe place.
message: You've been robbed at gunpoint. Your family feels unsafe and wishes to move away from the farm. You lose §200!

title: Switcheroo!
message: You've switched money with another player!

title: Transcendentalism.
message: Through some kind of divine intervention, you are moved 2 tiles forward... Does this mean there is a god?

title: The wayward spirits.
message: Your actions have not been looked upon so kindly by the ancient gods. You move back 2 tiles.

title: Bad Colleague
message: Your colleague was stupid and left the door open to all your cages. You move back 3 tiles to look for them.

title: The stock market has collapsed.
message: The stock market has collapsed, but you shorted the market! You gain §1000, and the knowledge that you earned money off of the suffering of others.

title: Tragedy
message: It's horrific! Ollie hacks your GitHub account. You lose §1000.

title: Bruh
message: This is such a bruh, lose §1500.

title: Tim - The Almighty
message: The entity colloquially known as Tim has bestowed upon you victory.

title: You have angered Tim
message: Tim is angry. You lose.

title: Side Hustle
message: You set up a side business buying properties and building houses or hotels on them. You now have a monopoly (no affiliation to the board game)  on local housing. Gain §750.

title: Bad Foresight
message: A rich gent on dumb blue bird platform makes you buy funny dog currency, lose §200.

title: Devastating
message: You're forced to use JetBrains products and throw away your sanity (and z500).

title: Tax Evasion
message: <details omitted>, gain z500.

title: Tax Invasion
message: The IRS breach your front door and seize their cash, lose z500.

title: Head Start In Life
message: You come from a rich family so you're allowed to go forward 3 spaces.

title: Tim The Angel Investor
message: You summon Tim for a loan of z2000

title: Animal Rights
message: Activists take away z500 of your money.

title: RIP Colin
message: Your rich uncle Hegarty passes, you inherit z1000!
